title: exceptions
content: # `prefect.server.exceptions` ## Classes ### `ObjectNotFoundError` Error raised by the Prefect REST API when a requested object is not found. If thrown during a request, this exception will be caught and a 404 response will be returned. ### `OrchestrationError` An error raised while orchestrating a state transition ### `MissingVariableError` An error raised by the Prefect REST API when attempting to create or update a deployment with missing required variables. ### `FlowRunGraphTooLarge` Raised to indicate that a flow run's graph has more nodes that the configured maximum
